title: Battle Raper 2 - Sexy Raper addon + Cap Raper
description:
Needs original Battle Raper 2 to play!


Sexy Raper

Description:

Sexy Raper features none of the robust fighting game play as seen in the original game; instead, it has an extended viewing mode where you can view the characters in various action poses and take screenshots at your leisure. All five "Battle Rapees" are back as well as the the flying fairy sidekick Eliza. Clothes unlocked in the game can be accessed and used (or unused) in the model feature. No male characters from the original game are featured here (including Shiki the zombie). 


Extract SexyRaper.rar and run SexyRaperSetup.exe to install SexyRaper. Extract [HF-Atachi] Battle Raper 2 - Sexy Raper addon [eng][noRegion].rar to your SexyRaper folder and run SexyRaper_eng_noregion.exe to play


Cap Raper

Description:

CapRaper is similar to Sexy Raper, but adds on three extra characters from Biko 3 and Des Blood 4.


Extract CapRaper Setup.rar and run CapRaperSetup.exe to install CapRaper. Run CapRaper.exe to play


Extra characters in the game

To get the three extra characters in the main game extract Battle.Raper.2.3.extra.characters.rar to your Battle Raper 2 folder. Run BattleRaper2.exe to play.
Optional -To crack BattleRaper2.exe to get NoCD Right click BattleRaper2.exe, select properties and untick Read-only. Then extract BattleRaper2_universal_plugin_patch.rar to your Battle Raper 2 folder and run BattleRaper2_universal_plugin_patch.exe. Click start to patch the exe. Run BattleRaper2.exe to play the game without CD.


You can only use the three new characters in "Free" mode or in the "healing" game by holding the CTRL key while selecting the first, second or the fifth character. The first character will then be Esk, the second Mayu and the fifth Bael.
